Name: Representation before the parking violations bureau.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the City of New York, in relation to representation before the parking violations bureau.
Text:
Be it in enacted by the Council as follows:

	Section 1.  Chapter 2 of title 19 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new section 19-213 to read as follows:
      �19-213 Any respondent before the parking violations bureau may designate any other person to represent such respondent.
 	�2.  This local law shall take effect immediately after its enactment into law.
